isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ 7 Engine Service Manual - Engine Electrical - Description of Engine Sensors, Valves, and Actuators - Fuel Rail Pressure (FRP) Sensor

svcproc.title: Fuel Rail Pressure (FRP) Sensor
svcproc.para: The FRP sensor is a variable capacitance sensor. The ECM monitors the FRP signal to determine the Fuel Volume Control Valve (FVCV) and Fuel Pressure Control Valve (FPCV) operation. The ECM monitors the FRP signal to determine the fuel injection pressure for engine operation. The FRP sensor provides feedback to the ECM for closed loop FRP control. The FRP sensor is installed in the fuel rail under the right valve cover.
